attributes.action: SIA NO MORE ONE MAN ON SITE - Legal requirement minimum two security officers.
attributes.additional_details: Obligated SIA Enforce this from all securities companies in UK.
attributes.background: Regulate SIA standards and enforce them in all businesses in UK. At least two security guards per site. Safety FIRST.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We can also only accept petitions from people who provide their full name. This can be in the form “first name last name” or “first initial last name”, but cannot be just a single name.
